nodes.text: Darth Krayt is an overview of the life of Sith Lord Darth Krayt written by Daniel Wallace and published in Star Wars Insider 113. It started with Krayt's origins as a young Tusken Raider on the planet Tatooine, leading to his father's death at the hands of bounty hunter Aurra Sing, and his apprenticeship to Jedi Master Ki-Adi-Mundi and the Dark Woman. The article continues with Krayt's exploits in the Clone Wars, his survival of Order 66 and duel with Obi-Wan Kenobi on Tatooine. The article ends with his tutelage under the long dead Sith XoXaan then later with Vergere while being tortured by the Yuuzhan Vong, his eventual war on the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances under the banner of the One Sith, and his death at the hands of his aide Darth Wyyrlok.
